ComicInfo.Title: The Fear Eaters - Part Two
ComicInfo.Summary:
As an incoming threat nears, old foes-U-Foes, to be exact- return to make life miserable for the Avengers! Meanwhile, Black Panther begins to question whether he belongs in the Avengers! Fantastic action and adventure for those beginning their journey into comics!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Jon Sommariva | 1 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Variant Cover | Dario Brizuela | 2 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-24 19:23:19. [CVDB726080]
ComicInfo.Characters: Black Panther, Black Widow, Captain America, Carol Danvers, Iron Man, Ironclad, Kkallakku, Madame Masque, Thor, Vapor, Vector, X-Ray
